entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 01:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: S 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of freezing rain or ice pellets in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
